items.title: Stocks to Watch: Adani Green, Vedanta, Ireda, Sterlite Tech, NMDC, TaMo
items.description: Vedanta has approved a third interim dividend of Rs 20 per share for FY25, raising the total dividend payout so far to Rs 13,474 crore.

items.title: Jigar S Patel of Anand Rathi suggests buying these three stocks today
items.description: Recently, Allcargo Logistics has formed a bullish Bat pattern, which is a harmonic chart pattern known for indicating potential reversals.

items.title: Nifty Financial Services shows bullish trend in near-term; details here
items.description: For near-term traders, the optimal strategy is to book profits at current levels, given the proximity to resistance.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Subdued GIFT Nifty, mixed Asian markets signal slow start for India
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Indian markets are likely to open on a subdued note as indicated by the GIFT Nifty futures that were trading marginally ahead of Nifty futures' last close.

items.title: Stock market today: Sensex, Nifty at record; Premier Energies IPO listing
items.description: Share Market Today, Tuesday, September 3, 2024: Baazar Style IPO, Premiere Energies IPO, economic data across countries to be on investors' radar today

items.title: Buy Macrotech & Sunteck; Hold Oberoi Realty & Godrej Prop, suggests Nuvama
items.description: The analysts believe that factors like healthy leverage, an increased focus on business development, and the potential for interest rate cuts will boost sales in the city.

items.title: Festive season may not light up portfolios, but here's where you can invest
items.description: With festive season approaching, sectors like automobiles, FMCG, and electronics usually see a sales boost

items.title: Dividend, Bonus, Buyback: 17 stocks turn ex-date today; are you eligible?
items.description: Shares of Garment Mantra Lifestyle and Nucleus Software Exports will trade ex-date for the bonus issue and share buyback, respectively, that they have announced

items.title: Govt bond yields seen steady ahead of state debt sale, US economic data
items.description: The market is closely watching key US data and Federal Reserve's rate action as these will be directional cues

items.title: How expensive are the Indian stock markets? A quick check on PE multiples
items.description: The run up in the markets in the past few months has made valuations expensive, analysts said, who now expect the rally to take a breather for the next few months as corporate earnings catch up.

items.title: F&O Cues: DIIs net long in Nifty highest in 2 months; futures premium sink
items.description: Derivatives market update for Sept 03: The Nifty September futures premium tumbled from Rs 141 on Friday to Rs 61 on Monday. DIIs added fresh longs in Nifty futures, while FIIs sold.

items.title: Premier Energies shares double investors money with bumper debut on bourses
items.description: Premier Energies IPO listing today: The company's shares listed at Rs 991 on the BSE, reflecting a whopping 120.22 per cent premium over the upper end of its issue price of Rs 450

items.title: Aadhar Housing up 6% as Kotak Institutional initiates coverage with 'Buy'
items.description: The surge in Aadhar Housing share came after Kotak Institutional Equities initiated coverage on the company with 'Buy' rating for a target price of Rs 550, marking an upside of 41%.

items.title: Matrimony.com surges 14% as board to mull share buyback on Sept 05
items.description: The stock hit a 52-week high of Rs 848, surged 14% on the BSE in Tuesday's intra-day trade and has rallied 40% in three weeks.

items.title: Crude Oil: Check trading strategy, target price and other key levels here
items.description: Oil recorded its first back-to-back monthly decline amid signs of sluggish demand in China and the United States raised concerns about future consumption growth.

items.title: Brigade Enterprises launches QIP issue to raise funds up to Rs 1,500 cr
items.description: Bengaluru-based Brigade Enterprises plans to raise up to Rs 1,500 crore by selling equity shares to institutional investors as part of its strategy to expand business.

items.title: Kaynes Tech rallies 8% on govt approval for semiconductor unit in Gujarat
items.description: The proposed unit, with a production capacity of six million chips per day, will be setup with an investment of Rs 3,300 crore.

items.title: HAL rises 5% after Cabinet approves Rs 26,000-cr order for 240 aero-engines
items.description: These aero-engines will be manufactured at the Koraput division of HAL and the delivery of these aero-engines would start after one year and complete over a period of eight years, the company said.

items.title: Brigade Enterprises up 5% after launching Rs 1,500 crore QIP
items.description: Brigade Enterprises launched a Rs 1,500-QIP after market hours  on Monday
